pages.text: Now that you have $(thing)Plastic,$() you will need to create $(item)Attuned Titanium.$()$(p)This alloy must be made in an $(thing)Upgraded Electric Purifier.$() See $(l:items/upgrades#purifierfiltering)Filtering Upgrade$(/l) for more information.
Place $(thing)1 Ender Pearl and 1 Mystium Blend$() as the filter items, and $(item)1 Pure Titanium Ingot$() in the main spot, to get $(9)1 Attuned Titanium Ingot.$()
You will need 2 $(item)Attuned Titanium Blocks$() and $(l:items/novasteel_tools#graphenerod)4 Graphene Rods$()...
...In order to make a $(5)Teleportation Pad.$() To get the $(thing)Reality Crystal,$() you will also need to make an $(l:blocks/entropy_reactor)Entropy Reactor.$()
As well as the $(thing)Teleportation Pad,$() you will also need an $(item)AEFG.$()$(p)This will protect you from negative effects in the $(d)Chaos Plane,$() at least while it's charged.

As well as your new items to protect against the dimension, $(c)Netherite Armor$() or better, as well as $(d)Mystium Tools$() is recommended, as the $(l:blocks/entropy_reactor#corruptshell)mobs native to the Chaos Plane$(/l) are tough.$(p)Finally, $(9)Night Vision Potions$() are recommended, as it is very dark there.

When you are ready, place down the $(thing)Teleportation Pad$() and RIGHT-CLICK it whilst standing on it to teleport to the $(d)Chaos Plane,$() thus ending the Synthetic Age, and beginning the $(l:age5)Chaotic Age.
